title.value: Data Exchange Industry – Pharmaceutical Quality (dx-PQ)

publisher.value: HL7 International / Biomedical Research and Regulation

name.value: HL7 International - Biomedical Research and Regulation

description.value:
***Content TBD***
This IG is developed for the Data exchange industry – Pharmaceutical Quality (dx-PQ) project * [Project Proposal: PSS-2137](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/PSS-2137) * [Project Scope Statement: PSS-2145](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/PSS-2145)

valueMarkdown.value: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology

description.value: FHIR artifacts that provide details about drug substances and drug products with names and identifiers; structure and structure characterization; physico-chemical properties; and dosage form and characterization (for drug products).
FHIR artifacts that provide details about drug substance and drug product components, materials, and Quality reference standards.
FHIR artifacts that provide details about impurity identification and characterization.
FHIR artifacts that provide details about each facility that is a manufacturer, supplier, or test site.
FHIR artifacts that provide details about each drug substance and drug product batch with identifiers.
FHIR artifacts that provide details about drug substance and drug product batch release testing and results.
FHIR artifacts that provide details about drug substance and drug product master batch properties and formula components.
FHIR artifacts that provide a manufacturing process overview and details about unit operations, process parameters, and in-process controls.
FHIR artifacts that provide details about manufacturing process validation protocols and results.
FHIR artifacts that provide details about test methods used to analyze drug substances and drug products including compendial and non-compendial testing.
FHIR artifacts that provide details about primary and secondary packaging components for drug substance and drug product.
FHIR artifacts that provide details about a stability study, including protocol (tests and acceptance criteria), test results, and drug substance or drug product batches involved in the testing.
FHIR artifacts that provide details about drug substance or drug product specification.
FHIR artifacts that provide details about compatibility studies and results.
FHIR artifacts used across many PQ domains.
Bundle – Drug Substance Specification dx-PQ - Example 1
Bundle – Drug Product Specification dx-PQ - Example 1
Bundle – Drug Substance Stability dx-PQ - Example 1
Bundle – Drug Product Stability dx-PQ - Example 1
Bundle – Batch Analysis dx-PQ - Example 1, product
Bundle – Batch Analysis dx-PQ - Example 2, substance
Bundle - Product Process Validation dx-PQ - Example 1
Bundle – Analytical Procedure dx-PQ - Example 1, drug product
Bundle – Analytical Procedure dx-PQ - Example 2, drug substance
Bundle - Container Closure System dx-PQ - Example 1, drug product
Bundle - Container Closure System dx-PQ - Example 2, drug substance
This DiagnosticReport profile represents results reports for batch analysis, stability study, characterization, impurities analysis, and manufacturing process validation study, etc.

name.value: DiagnosticReport - Drug Analysis PQ - Stability Study, Product

description.value: Stability study results report, drug product example
PlanDefinition - dxPQ - Example 5, Stability Study Protocol
